message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40.  We should settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our gains.
I'm willing to give you a fair deal, Alice.  Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share this time.  Inflation is going to hurt us both, so let's get this over with quickly.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is getting worse for both of us with each round. I'll take a little less, but this needs to end now. 55/45, take it or leave it.
